career.name: ZippyBot
career.title: Founder, Software Developer
description: Developed an open-source AI-powered job bot to simplify job searches for graduate students and developers, with a goal of reaching 1000+ users by the end of 2025.
Automated global job listings, fetching unlimited job opportunities for users
Optimized user experience with advanced filtering, making job searches 50% faster

career.name: Freelancer

description: Engineered a high-performance e-commerce website for a Swedish client, aiming to increase online visibility by 80%.
Implemented smooth scrolling transitions and interactive animations, improving user engagement by 20%
Optimized website speed, reducing load times by 50%, enhancing customer retention.
